subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Frank'sBoxes/System pix/29Board-wired.jpg 
  Uploaded by : purplespacefriend <franks-boxes@...> 
  Description : 29--Yet another proto type to test the "no RVG" concept. I'm also trying a slightly different config for the AM RF, and using shielded wire for all RF, and oscillator connectins. .  

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Frank%27sBoxes/System%20pix/29Board-wired.jpg 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/help/us/groups/files

Regards,

purplespacefriend <franks-boxes@...>
